Title: The Puppy
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Romance, Sci-Fi
Writer: Ben Bocquelet (created by), Guillaume Cassuto, Joe Parham
Actors: Jacob Hopkins, Terrell Ransom Jr., Teresa Gallagher, Kyla Rae Kowalewski
Plot: The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted, except it's actually a turtle, and it hates them.
